item.description:
November's event will be a SATURDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: Are you stuck in the middle?

This is how "complications ensue." Our old location is CLOSED.

I am tentatively picking Lincoln Street Coffee at the Newton Highlands stop on the Green line D train.

Challenge: Show up! Seriously. This is the challenge.

Agenda:

4:00 Names.

Topic: Stuck in the middle?
It can be hard to get through the middle of the story.
Sometimes it feels like the "juice" has gone out of it.
It's tempting to give up.
How do you push through to the end?

5:00 Break
**Off-topic discussion will ensue after the break.

6:00 Go Home and Write!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers November Meetup
